attributes.action: We need the ruling party to fall, lest he continue to harm the UK
attributes.additional_details: I don’t want to see Britain follow in the footsteps of Hong Kong, so I launched a petition to remind the British people to sign the petition so that people can once again choose to re-elect a government that is suitable for Britain’s long-term future.
attributes.background: I hope to use this petition to bring down the Labor Party as soon as possible, because the Labor Party is also harmful to the British people in foreign affairs and domestic affairs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Call a General Election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
